actions.text: Committee on Foreign Relations ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Pell under the authority of the order of Jun 24, 91. With written report No. 102-99.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 146.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

official_title: An original bill to amend the Arms Control and Disarmament Act to authorize appropriations for the Arms Control and Disarmament Agency for fiscal year 1992, and for other purposes.
short_title: Arms Control and Disarmament Amendments Act of 1991

summary.text: Arms Control and Disarmament Amendments Act of 1991 - Amends the Arms Control and Disarmament Act to authorize appropriations for FY 1992 for the external research program and the Arms Control and Disarmament Agency. Authorizes the Director of the Agency to administer oaths and take sworn statements in the course of investigations made pursuant to such Act. Requires the President to submit to the Speaker of the House and the chairman of the Senate Foreign Relations Committee a report prepared by the Agency's Inspector General on the Agency's fulfillment of primary functions.

titles.title: Arms Control and Disarmament Amendments Act of 1991
An original bill to amend the Arms Control and Disarmament Act to authorize appropriations for the Arms Control and Disarmament Agency for fiscal year 1992, and for other purposes.
